tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  RESPECTED
comments: Josh is a great teacher for Intro to Logic! He makes the sometimes difficult and confusing subject matter easy to understand and is always more than patient and helpful with anyone who has a question. There is homework due almost every class, but the homework he gives is your chance to exercise what he teaches in class. Classes go by quickly.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Amazing teacher. Goes above and beyond to help his students out, preparing detailed answer and study guides, holding off campus office hours, anything he can do to help you understand the material, which can definitely be tricky. Also pretty funny- basically an awkward, shamelessly geeky guy who loves dissecting arguments. Take his class.

Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Attendance not mandatory but almost necessary after the mid-term. Homework every class but most of it\'s very easy. VERY helpful if you don\'t understand. Easy to get a hold of. Kind of scatter-brained. Moves around a lot. Kinda geeky but a good teacher for sure. A strong recommendation from me.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Great teacher, young guy, willing to help whenever people need it. Very easygoing, minimal homework, tests were open book.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: AWESOME TEACHER. He will go out of his way to help you with everything. The class can get tuff at the end, but not horrible. He likes to joke a lot too, which keeps the class very casual. Great teacher. (btw his last name is Upson, not Upton)

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: As long as you keep good notes, the class is pretty easy. He gives you a study guide before each quiz that contains all of the information you need to know. Assignments consisted of 3 quizzes (multiple choice, short answer, and essay) and a take-home final. Cool guy, very conversational and explains things so they\'re easy to understand.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Respected (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Josh is one of the best proffesors i have had yet. he makes class interesting and is very laid back. he makes you work but its not overwhelming. he\'s also very good at making sure you understand the material. i would highly recommend him.
